QuestData.Title: Yakity Yak
QuestData.Description: Yaungols! They come through here taking what they want and destroying whatever's left.$b$bI can't have these thugs destroy the last pieces of the Yak Wash here. It's all my boy and I have left.$b$bHead over to our old ranch and dish out some pain on them yaungols. I bet if you kill enough of them they'll think twice before attacking anything in this area.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 9 Burilgi Despoilers at the Muskpaw Ranch.
